alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Prentiss; Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 6:24PM CDT until August 05 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Tishomingo County in northeastern Mississippi... Northeastern Prentiss County in northeastern Mississippi... Southeastern Alcorn County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 624 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Thrashers, or near Booneville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Booneville, Iuka, Burnsville, Glen, Tishomingo, Thrashers, Hinkle, Burton, Midway, Leedy, Rienzi, Paden, Thrasher, Jobes, Gaston, Hazard Switch, Walker Siding, Holcut, Holts Spur and Neil. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
